content: the spooky cute halloween granny square blanket is made up of granny squares ghosts pumpkins and flowers the blanket is made by crocheting granny squares and the appliques separately the appliques are attached to the squares and then the squares are joined together lastly a cute frilly border is added to add to the cutesy halloween theme of this blanket materials needed are worsted weight yarn and a 6 00mm + 4 00mm crochet hook
